name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
description: The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashedthe might of his Delusion.  It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character.The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents asolipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.  Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beastbefore throwing himself into battle against you.
